legend.label: Preliminary Flood Insurance Rate Maps 2015
legend.tooltip: Released in 2015 as part of a citywide flood map update, the Preliminary FIRMs establish the 1% annual chance floodplain. For building code and zoning purposes, the more expansive of the either the 2015 or 2007 maps is used.

items.label: V Zone
items.tooltip: A portion of the area subject to flooding from the 1% annual chance flood and referred to in the Zoning Resolution as the 'high-risk flood zone'. These areas are subject to high velocity wave action (a breaking wave 3 feet high or larger).

items.label: A Zone
items.tooltip: A portion of the area subject to flooding from the 1% annual chance flood and referred to in the Zoning Resolution as the 'high-risk flood zone'. These areas are not subject to high velocity wave action but are still considered high risk flooding areas.

items.label: Shaded X Zone
items.tooltip: The area subject to flooding from the 0.2% annual chance flood and referred to in the Zoning Resolution as the 'moderate-risk flood zone'.
